txt.en: The Elf Candelleth may be found at a ruin bearing her name. The ruin stands atop a cliff overlooking the Bruinen, south beyond the Bruinen Gorges. She requires aid from any who will answer the call.

'I am pleased that you have arrived. Angmarim skulk through this land, and there are refugees who need assistance. I will remain vigilant for any news of why these ill-meaning Men crawl through our lands.\n\n'If you desire to help, there would be those who are grateful and would offer rewards.'
Candelleth, an Elf dwelling in the southern part of the Trollshaws, has need of aid.
You have arrived in the Southern Trollshaws
Echad Candelleth in Tâl Bruinen sits atop a cliff overlooking the great river. You should seek out Candelleth there and lend her what aid you may.
Talk to Candelleth at Echad Candelleth in Tâl Bruinen
Echad Candelleth in Tâl Bruinen sits atop a cliff overlooking the great river. You should seek out Candelleth there and lend her what aid you may.
